derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: blend of breakfast and lunch

entry.def: Brunch is a meal that is eaten in the late morning. It is a combination of breakfast and lunch.

means.word_mean: 1. combination breakfast and lunch; usually served in late morning
